summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) announcing the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein on sex trafficking charges. It congratulates the prosecution team and announces a press conference for the following day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; arrested on sex trafficking charges for abusing girls as young as 14.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on sex trafficking charges and taken into custody.

events.title: Arraignment and Unsealing of Indictment
events.description: Epstein is scheduled to be presented, arraigned, and the indictment against him will be unsealed.

events.title: Press Conference Announcing Charges
events.description: A press conference is scheduled for 11 AM to formally announce the charges against Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on the evening of July 6, 2019, on federal sex trafficking charges.
The indictment involves allegations that Epstein abused dozens of victims, some as young as 14 years old.
The arrest and prosecution are characterized by the U.S. Attorney's Office as an important case against a powerful individual.
The email highlights the work of a prosecution team within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
